variable.name: B_2HPG7
variable.description: TESTED FOR 2 HOUR POST-ORAL GLUCOSE CHALLENGE TEST AT EXAM 7 (NOTE: ALL SUBJECTS WITH IGT AND A SUBSET OF SUBJECTS WITH NGT AT EXAM 5 [BLOCK-RANDOMLY SELECTED FROM 5 QUINTILE STRATA OF FBS] WERE OFFERED A MORNING EXAM AT CYCLE 7 INCLUDING AN ORAL GLUCOSE TOLERANCE TEST.)

variable.name: H2PG7
variable.description: 2-HOUR POST-ORAL GLUCOSE CHALLENGE TEST, EXAM 7 MEASURED IN MG/DL (NOTE: ALL SUBJECTS WITH IGT AND A SUBSET OF SUBJECTS WITH NGT AT EXAM 5 [BLOCK-RANDOMLY SELECTED FROM 5 QUINTILE STRATA OF FBS] WERE OFFERED A MORNING EXAM AT CYCLE 7 INCLUDING AN ORAL GLUCOSE TOLERANCE TEST.)

variable.name: QNFBS5
variable.description: 7 LEVEL GLUCOSE TOLERANCE STATUS AT EXAM 5 USED AS SAMPLING FRAME FOR EXAM 7 OGTT (NOTE: ALL SUBJECTS WITH IGT AND A SUBSET OF SUBJECTS WITH NGT AT EXAM 5 [BLOCK-RANDOMLY SELECTED FROM 5 QUINTILE STRATA OF FBS] WERE OFFERED A MORNING EXAM AT CYCLE 7 INCLUDING AN ORAL GLUCOSE TOLERANCE TEST.)
variable.value: 1st Quintile of Fasting Glucose (FBS) at Exam 5
2nd Quintile of Fasting Glucose (FBS) at Exam 5
3rd Quintile of Fasting Glucose (FBS) at Exam 5
4th Quintile of Fasting Glucose (FBS) at Exam 5
5th Quintile of Fasting Glucose (FBS) at Exam 5
Impaired FPG/ Impaired Glucose Tolerance at Ex 5 (FBS =110-125 or 2hPG 140-199)
DM = FBS>126 mg/dL or treated diabetes at exam 5
